name: cannery
tagline: A pantry inventory app for tracking food items and expiration dates
description: Cannery is a simple inventory management web app to track pantry goods and expiration dates. It is ideal for reducing food waste and organizing household food stock, with an easy-to-use and mobile-friendly interface.

features.title: Pantry Inventory
features.description: Track household food stock and pantry items. Know what you have

features.title: Expiration Tracking
features.description: Monitor expiration dates to reduce food waste. Save money

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive interface works on all devices. Check inventory anywhere

features.title: Food Waste Reduction
features.description: Prevent spoilage with expiration alerts. Sustainable living

features.title: Easy Organization
features.description: Simple system for household food management. Stay organized

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your inventory data private. Complete control
